Notes.Text:
This update for libid3tag fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2004-2779 CVE-2017-11551: Fixed id3_utf16_deserialize() in utf16.c,
  which previously misparsed ID3v2 tags encoded in UTF-16 with an odd
  number of bytes, triggering an endless loop allocating memory until
  OOM leading to DoS. (bsc#1081959 bsc#1081961)
- CVE-2017-11550 CVE-2008-2109: Fixed the handling of unknown
  encodings when parsing ID3 tags. (bsc#1081962 bsc#387731)
Notes.Title: Details

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4

Vulnerabilities.Description: id3_utf16_deserialize() in utf16.c in libid3tag through 0.15.1b misparses ID3v2 tags encoded in UTF-16 with an odd number of bytes, triggering an endless loop allocating memory until an OOM condition is reached, leading to denial-of-service (DoS).

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4:libid3tag-0.15.1b-132.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4:libid3tag-devel-0.15.1b-132.3.1

Vulnerabilities.Description: field.c in the libid3tag 0.15.0b library allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via an ID3_FIELD_TYPE_STRINGLIST field that ends in '\0', which triggers an infinite loop.

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4:libid3tag-0.15.1b-132.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4:libid3tag-devel-0.15.1b-132.3.1

Vulnerabilities.Description: The id3_ucs4_length function in ucs4.c in libid3tag 0.15.1b allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL Pointer Dereference and application crash) via a crafted mp3 file.

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4:libid3tag-0.15.1b-132.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4:libid3tag-devel-0.15.1b-132.3.1

Vulnerabilities.Description: The id3_field_parse function in field.c in libid3tag 0.15.1b allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (OOM) via a crafted MP3 file.

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4:libid3tag-0.15.1b-132.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4:libid3tag-devel-0.15.1b-132.3.1
